Text: Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ ulo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l kwʼIjipti wa, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ki So̩lo̩mo̩n jʼonu Israe̩l, ochu Zif, kʼi chʼochu ekeji ef o̩do̩, kʼowñ chane̩ ekʼunyi Jihofa le̩.
Oñ ujiji unyi ki So̩lo̩mo̩n onu ko̩ todu Jihofa le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, o̩gba-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩gwa.
Oñ ujiji agbaru ki dʼo̩gba uña e̩gahi unyi le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, alu kʼunabe̩ unyi le̩ de̩; unefu-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa o̩gba unyi.
Oñ i fʼoli iwido che todu unyi le̩ kʼoli-wñ chʼeko̩fi omune̩ da ki chʼe̩gudu jo̩.
Oñ i fʼo̩pata fia nʼoji omune̩ ki dachi nʼo̩do̩ unyi le̩ daka. I lʼunyi e̩gahi kpai uña efo̩ e-efo̩ daka. Oñ i fʼu ko̩da ki chʼunyi unyi lo daka.

Unabe̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, unabe̩ e-ki dʼalumeji chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa, unabe̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ ate̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ mebie; todu i fʼagbamune̩-wñ che kʼi dufu o̩do̩da o̩lʼo̩do̩ le̩ alo daka, todu kʼe̩wñ du ki we egwunyʼo̩do̩ unyi le̩ onugo.
Unyi ku ma ane le̩, ma nʼokuta ku ma ñwo̩che kpa kwef oko ne; ma gbʼiche̩ ihama kpai e̩do̩ kpai e̩wñ ido̩na ebije du abu ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ ane̩ n.
Alugbana unyi ki yamo̩ akolo-wñ alumeji dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ unyi; oñ ma te̩gu agube ki chʼadagbala gbogbo tʼunyi alumeji, ma kwef e-alumeji le̩ tef e̩ke̩ta-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ i kʼunyi le̩, oñ i fʼu kpoji: i la kʼugbo̩lo̩ oli kpai akatakpo oli sida te̩ rʼoji-wñ.
Oñ i fʼunyi ki nʼoji omune̩ le̩ ko̩ yamo̩ o̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ du, o̩gba-wñ okoke chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu; agbamune̩-wñ chʼigbo oli sida ki kado unyi le̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini,

I chʼe-unyi kʼuwe̩ ako̩-i iche̩wñ kʼe̩ jʼalule̩ teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, kʼe̩ kʼajo̩ alu kʼomi ñwate̩, kʼe̩ la de uko̩-mi du kʼe̩ lule̩ teju-wñ; mak u naje̩ ñw o̩la-mi lonyane̩ ugbo we̩, owñ chʼe-kʼu ka ñwu Defid ata-we̩
Tak omi agugu ef amo̩ma Israe̩l, u ñʼahi abo-mi Israe̩l tinyo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼunyi le̩ ko, oñ i fʼu kpoji.
I nʼakatakpo oli sida chʼo̩do̩ unyi le̩ ejefu. Akwʼe̩rane̩ o̩do̩ le̩ gbogbo kad o̩pata-wñ ate̩, i mʼoli ko bʼo ma ejefu; oñ i kʼoli fir bʼajita unyi le̩ ma.
I la nʼakatakpo oli sida ko̩ ohibo̩wo̩ ogu unyi le̩ ejubi, akwʼane̩pe̩te̩-wñ gbogbo wa kad o̩pata-wñ ate̩; i la fʼu ko̩ ejefu-wñ abe̩le̩, kʼi chʼunyi ejefu kʼi chʼuña kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩.
Oñ unyi le̩, owñ chʼunyi e̩gahi ejo̩gba-wñ, chʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji.
Oli sida ki bʼejefu unyi le̩ ma chʼe̩kina dab e̩rʼugba kpai ododo; oli sida i che chaka; ma li okuta-wñ du n.
Oñ i fʼuña kiafo̩ ñwo̩che alumeji unyi ejefu le̩, kʼi dʼakpati alo Jihofa gugu o̩mo̩.

Ujiji ejefu uña kiafo̩ le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, o̩gba-wñ laño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu ge̩; tak i mʼo̩jamalia hiolo ko gamʼo̩ oñ i ño̩ ko gamʼo̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku ma nʼoli sida che ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼo̩jamalia hiolo gamʼejefu unyi le̩, oñ i mʼiyagba o̩jamalia ko kofi o̩gba uña kiafo̩ le̩ da; i la mʼo̩jamalia ko gamʼo̩.
Abe̩le̩ i kʼo̩jamalia gamʼo̩lʼunyi le̩ chaka gbogbo taku ma fʼuko̩lo̩ unyi le̩ chekpa; i ño̩ kʼo̩jamalia gamʼo̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-uña kiafo̩ le̩ chaka ge̩.
Tak i nʼoli o̩lif fʼiche̩rub meji gbe̩ ef uña kiafo̩ le̩, o̩gba-wñ mejeji chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa.
Ika che̩rub o̩wo̩ ʼka la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, ika-wñ o̩wo̩ ekeji chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu ge̩; akwo otitala ika-wñ o̩wo̩ʼka tʼotitala ika-wñ o̩wo̩ ekeji chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa.
Che̩rub ekeji laño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa ge̩. E̩ñwa iche̩rub meji le̩ chʼoka, alu kʼo̩la-wñ mejeji le̩ de̩ la chʼoka.
O̩gba che̩rub oka chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa, abe̩le̩ che̩rub ekeji de̩ ge̩.
Tak i mʼiche̩rub le̩ ko jʼef unyi ejefu le̩; ika iche̩rub la chenadala, todu kʼikaʼka ki kad o̩do̩ʼka, kʼika che̩rub ekeji la kad o̩do̩ ekeji; ika-ma la kad omune̩ alumeji unyi le̩.
Oñ i kʼo̩jamalia wenyʼiche̩rub meji le̩ o̩la.
I la fʼina ko̩ nyu o̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ du daka, ejefu-wñ kpai ejo̩do̩da-wñ, ina-wñ chʼuwo̩li iche̩rub, kpai oli ki dab e̩kpe, kpai ododo ki mutu.
I la mʼo̩jamalia ko bʼajita unyi le̩ ma, tʼejefu, tʼejo̩do̩da.
Oñ i nʼoli olif chʼolugbana tod alu o̩na unyi kiafo̩ le̩: oli afida ate̩ alugbana kpai oli akolo-wñ chʼukpe̩re̩lu-wñ.

Oli o̩lif oñ i ne̩ che o̩lugbana meji; oñ i fʼina iche̩rub kpai oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ kpai ododo ki mutu ko̩ nyʼu, tak i kʼo̩jamalia gamʼo̩la-wñ; oñ i mʼo̩jamalia ko nadala bʼo̩la iche̩rub kpai oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ ma.
Abe̩le̩ i ño̩ ne̩ oli o̩lif che oli alugbana unyi e̩gahi onugo, owñ chʼukpe̩re̩le̩-wñ;
kpai olugbana oli fir meji: olugbana-wñ oka chʼe̩kpana meji kʼi aguche̩ nʼo̩la-wñ, oñ e̩kpana olugbana ekeji le̩ aguche̩ nʼo̩la-wñ ge̩.
Tak i fʼina iche̩rub kpai oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ kpʼododo ki mutu ko nyʼu; oñ i kʼo̩jamalia gamʼo̩, i fʼu ka tunyʼina-wñ.
Tak i nʼokuta ku ma da ne anuku, o̩gba okuta me̩ta nʼoji omune̩, tak igbo oli sida mud o̩gba omune̩ noji e-le̩.
Ma la fʼe̩re̩ unyi Jihofa nyane̩ ef ochu Zif, o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩.
Oñ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwaka, ochu Bul, owñ chʼochu e̩ke̩jo̩, ma fʼuko̩lo̩ unyi le̩ che kpa kpai e̩ko̩da-wñ chaka, teju alu du ku ma ñwa te̩. Abe̩le̩ i dʼef unyi le̩ eko̩ o̩do̩ mebie.
